attributes.action: Cancel the new Snapchat update because it’s so bad.
attributes.background: Snapchat has been so good for years. Update after update, no problem. But now it’s just ridiculous. Now I don’t know what a Snapchat is from a story. Things needs to go back to how they used to be. Red chat and blue chat... swipe for stories. Nuff said.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/
